content: Many Censor Holders pray around this area, but most will ignore you. There's also a lone Overseeing Monk praying to an altar off to the left, which holds another green Wisp to absorb.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Main Plaza'.
The content is as follows:
Many Censor Holders pray around this area, but most will ignore you. There's also a lone Overseeing Monk praying to an altar off to the left, which holds another green Wisp to absorb.
